characters.name: LIISA
characters.description: Väike inimene, tüdruk, blondide juustega, punaste põskedega. Seljas soe roosa talvekombe, millel on väikesed sinised lumehelbed. Peas soe roosa müts ja käes roosad labakindad. Tema nägu on rõõmsameelne ja naeratav. Armas multifilmistiil.

characters.name: MART
characters.description: Väike inimene, poiss, lühikeste pruunide juustega. Seljas soe sinine talvekombe, millel on väikesed valged tähed. Peas soe sinine müts ja käes sinised labakindad. Tema nägu on uudishimulik ja sõbralik. Armas multifilmistiil.

locations.name: TOA SOOJUS
locations.description: Cozy children's living room with light blue walls, a warm wooden floor, and a large window on the back wall showing a snowy winter landscape with bare trees. A small, colorful round rug is on the floor. A red fabric armchair is in the right corner. Warm, soft light fills the room. Cartoon style.

locations.name: LUMINE MÄGI
locations.description: Gentle snowy hill covered in pristine white snow, surrounded by a few snow-covered pine trees. The sky is bright pale blue with soft white clouds. The sun is shining gently, casting soft shadows. The bottom of the hill is flat, open snow. A bright red plastic sled is lying on the snow. Cartoon style.

pages.scene: Liisa, a small human girl with blonde hair and rosy cheeks, is standing in the cozy children's living room with light blue walls and a warm wooden floor. She is wearing indoor clothes (a simple long-sleeved shirt and trousers). Mart, a small human boy with short brown hair, is standing next to her. They are both looking out the large window on the back wall, which shows a snowy winter landscape with bare trees. They are smiling. A small, colorful round rug is on the floor, and a red fabric armchair is in the right corner.

Liisa, a small human girl with blonde hair and rosy cheeks, and Mart, a small human boy with short brown hair, are standing in the cozy children's living room. They are both wearing indoor clothes. They are pointing excitedly out the large window at the snow outside. Mart is bouncing a little in anticipation. A small, colorful round rug is on the floor, and a red fabric armchair is in the right corner.

Liisa, a small human girl with blonde hair and rosy cheeks, is standing in the cozy children's living room, holding a pair of pink mittens. Mart, a small human boy with short brown hair, is standing close to her. They are both wearing indoor clothes and looking at each other with big smiles and excited expressions, eager to play outside. A small, colorful round rug is on the floor, and a red fabric armchair is in the right corner.

Liisa, a small human girl with blonde hair and rosy cheeks, wearing a warm pink winter snowsuit with small blue snowflakes, a warm pink hat, and pink mittens, is standing near the door in the cozy children's living room. Mart, a small human boy with short brown hair, wearing a warm blue winter snowsuit with small white stars, a warm blue hat, and blue mittens, is standing next to her. They are holding hands and smiling broadly, ready to go outside. A small, colorful round rug is on the floor, and a red fabric armchair is in the right corner.

Liisa, a small human girl with blonde hair and rosy cheeks, wearing a warm pink winter snowsuit with small blue snowflakes, a warm pink hat, and pink mittens, is standing at the bottom of a gentle snowy hill. Mart, a small human boy with short brown hair, wearing a warm blue winter snowsuit with small white stars, a warm blue hat, and blue mittens, is holding the rope of a bright red plastic sled. They are both smiling excitedly. The hill is covered in pristine white snow, with snow-covered pine trees in the background. The sky is bright pale blue.

Liisa, a small human girl with blonde hair and rosy cheeks, wearing a warm pink winter snowsuit with small blue snowflakes, a warm pink hat, and pink mittens, is pushing the back of a bright red plastic sled. Mart, a small human boy with short brown hair, wearing a warm blue winter snowsuit with small white stars, a warm blue hat, and blue mittens, is pulling the sled's rope up a gentle snowy hill. They are both looking up the hill with determined and happy smiles. The hill is covered in pristine white snow, with snow-covered pine trees in the background. The sky is bright pale blue.

Liisa, a small human girl with blonde hair and rosy cheeks, wearing a warm pink winter snowsuit with small blue snowflakes, a warm pink hat, and pink mittens, is sitting on a bright red plastic sled, laughing happily. Mart, a small human boy with short brown hair, wearing a warm blue winter snowsuit with small white stars, a warm blue hat, and blue mittens, is sitting in front of her on the same sled, also laughing. The sled is sliding quickly down the gentle snowy hill, with a gentle spray of snow behind it. Their hats are slightly askew. The sky is bright pale blue.

Liisa, a small human girl with blonde hair and rosy cheeks, wearing a warm pink winter snowsuit with small blue snowflakes, a warm pink hat, and pink mittens, is sitting in the snow at the bottom of a gentle snowy hill, next to a bright red plastic sled. Mart, a small human boy with short brown hair, wearing a warm blue winter snowsuit with small white stars, a warm blue hat, and blue mittens, is sitting next to her. They are both looking at each other, still laughing and smiling broadly, with a few small snowflakes on their snowsuits. The sky is bright pale blue.

Liisa, a small human girl with blonde hair and rosy cheeks, wearing a warm pink winter snowsuit with small blue snowflakes, a warm pink hat, and pink mittens, is standing at the bottom of a gentle snowy hill, holding one side of the bright red plastic sled's rope. Mart, a small human boy with short brown hair, wearing a warm blue winter snowsuit with small white stars, a warm blue hat, and blue mittens, is holding the other side of the rope. They are both looking back up the hill with happy, contented smiles, ready to go again. The sky is bright pale blue.
